entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Newmarket
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:10 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: King City North 3:00 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -1.8°C
Wind: ESE 19 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle mixed with freezing drizzle. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain ending early this evening then cloudy and 60 percent chance of drizzle or freezing drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle before morning. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
